name: Shrines Of Legend: Demo
description:
This is the first short demo of a game i made for my education. It's a top down Archer game. The objective is to complete the puzzles and get to the ending of the map, but be aware, there are dragons and monsters trying to get you.

Please be gentle. This is my first Unity project and my first game on itch.io

==Controls==

Move: A W S D

Aim: Right Mousebutton

Shoot: HOLD Left Mousebutton

Restart: Backspace

Invincability cheat: H
